2100310.name: Ninja Clan
2100310.description:
Ninja Clan is a Strategy Card game set in feudal Japan, where you must deal with a ninja clan that has seized power in the country and wreaked havoc.

In this fractured era, you won't be following a single main character; instead, you'll be collecting ninja cards, each with different stats. Consistently liberate the regions of Japan, reach the enemy base and crush it!

Key features


Collecting cards
Collect ninja cards, get new ones and upgrade old abilities to use them effectively in battle

Strategy developing
Think over the strategy of your game, getting and using the abilities you need

Equipment
Collect your own combinations of equipment for each individual ninja in order to increase the characteristics you need
2100310.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
